log.no_images: No images found in the selected folder.
log.only_one_image: Only one valid image found. Nothing to compare.
log.loading_done: Finished loading {count} files ({reused} reused from cache).
log.image_cache_signature_mismatch: Image cache signature mismatch. Resetting cache.
log.convert_heic: Converted HEIC using Windows Image Component (install HEIF Image Extensions if missing).
hint.heic_install: Install the "HEIF Image Extensions" (and HEVC Video Extensions if prompted) from Microsoft Store so Windows can decode HEIC files.
log.extension_fail: Failed to detect image format for {path}. The file might be corrupted or locked.
log.moved_corrupt: Moved corrupt or unreadable file to duplicates: {path}
ui.status_checkpoint_cleared: Checkpoint cleared. Next run will start over.
ui.status_resume_ready: Configured to resume from the last checkpoint.
ui.resume_detected_desc: Resume from the saved checkpoint or discard it to start over.
ui.footer_description: Duplicates are moved to the 'duplicates' folder of the selected directory once detected. Settings are locked while processing.
settings.title: Settings
settings.ssim_desc: Similarity score required to treat two images as duplicates (0.50-1.00). Higher values mean stricter matching.
settings.phash_desc: Maximum Hamming distance between perceptual hashes (0-64). Lower values reduce false positives but may miss matches.
settings.lang_desc: Language used for the application's UI labels.
settings.formats_desc: These formats are analyzed when scanning a folder. Some codecs might require optional Windows components.
